content:
Alright, let's set up here... Ah! Not in the Camp,
this is a shared space,
looks like the "let destiny decide" mode isn't foolproof after all.
info: 布设帐篷-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
If I were to pick a spot for the <color=#8AAB4B>tent</color>,
I'd close my eyes, take seven steps left, three steps forward,
turn right, one step, and there we have it!
info: 布设帐篷-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
They'll vanish as quick as the wind—whoosh!
And once they're gone, they're gone for good.
So think carefully about where you pitch your tent, okay?
info: 布设帐篷-莎莎_莎莎任务闲聊

content:
Before that,
I, Bensa, will conduct a thorough patrol for everyone,
to check if there's anything fun— I mean, if there are any dangers around!

content:
Once <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> picks the perfect spot for the <color=#8AAB4B>tent</color>,
I'll zoom right over in a flash,
and help you set up the most amazing tent ever!

All the plants and trees around will suddenly...
